Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2018 08:51AM MelZ wrote: Thank you all for sharing and giving me hope! I was dx stage iv in Oct. I had a CT scan today and am anxious for the results. I saw the Stanford article and hope that breast cancer becomes an area of focus with this tx.
Posts.Title: ER+ PR+ HER - longterm survival sharethehope Celebrate_Life

Posts.Content: Dec 13, 2015 08:51PM MelZ wrote: I am so happy to read these stories! It's hard to be optimistic all of the time and was feeling extra fearful today. 15 radiation treatments left and looking for an adjuvant clinical trial to reduce risk. Thanks for sharing and giving me hope!
Posts.Title: Stage III Cancer Survivors...15+ years and out weesa lexi4
